channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 英ガーディアン紙US版によると、進歩的な評論家メフディ・ハサンがレギュラー・コラムニストとして加わる。
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
The Guardian US says progressive pundit Mehdi Hasan joins as a regular columnist; the outlet has been staffing up in recent months, adding well-known writers  —  The Scoop  —  The progressive pundit Mehdi Hasan is joining The Guardian following his abrupt departure from MSNBC.

item.title: ディズニー・プレジデント・オブ・アジア太平洋のルーク・カン氏とのQ&A：アジアのエンターテインメントビジネス、ディズニーのストリーミング戦略の進化、Disney+の成長、広告などについて（Patrick Brzeski/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Patrick Brzeski / The Hollywood Reporter:
Q&A with Disney President of Asia-Pacific Luke Kang on the Asian entertainment business, evolving Disney's streaming strategy, growing Disney+, ads, and more  —  Luke Kang shares how the media giant has come to its streaming strategy for the region and his current views on major content markets like China, South Korea and Japan.

item.title: 中国のライブストリーミング・タレント・エージェンシーはどのようにしてインフルエンサーをリクルートしているのか？
item.description:
Viola Zhou / Rest of World:
How livestreaming talent agencies in China recruit influencers, often signing them to multiyear contracts that cost tens of thousands of dollars to breach  —  Chinese livestream agencies promise influencers fame and money, but end up trapping them in multi-year contracts.

item.title: 2週間前に同局を退社した元CNNキャスターでシニア政治アナリストのジョン・エイヴロンが、ニューヨーク州議会第1区への出馬を申請（Filip Timotija/The Hill）
item.description:
Filip Timotija / The Hill:
Former CNN anchor and senior political analyst John Avlon files to run in New York's 1st Congressional District, after leaving the network two weeks ago  —  Former CNN Anchor John Avlon filed to run for Congress after leaving the news network two weeks ago.

item.title: インドネシア、フェイスブックやグーグルなどデジタル・プラットフォームにコンテンツ提供メディアへの支払いを義務付ける規制を発表（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
Indonesia issues a regulation requiring digital platforms, including Facebook and Google, to pay media outlets that provide them with content  —  Indonesian President Joko Widodo said on Tuesday he had signed a regulation requiring digital platforms to pay media outlets that provide them with content …

item.title: ジャーナリストの給与に5年間で5000万ドルを提供したカナダのローカル・ジャーナリズム・イニシアチブは3月31日に期限を迎えるが、更新されるかどうかは不明（Brishti Basu/CBC News）
item.description:
Brishti Basu / CBC News:
Canada's Local Journalism Initiative, which gave $50M over five years for journalists' salaries, expires March 31, with no word on whether it will be renewed  —  After mass layoffs across country's largest news outlets, independent publications await news of their fate

item.title: 過激派グループを調査していたRaw Storyのジョーダン・グリーン記者の自宅（ノースカロライナ州）の前で、ネオナチとされる5人が発炎筒を持ち、「sieg heil」のジェスチャーをした（Will Sommer/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Will Sommer / Washington Post:
Five alleged neo-Nazis held flares and made “sieg heil” gestures outside the NC home of Raw Story reporter Jordan Green, who was investigating extremist groups  —  The chilling visit to Raw Story reporter Jordan Green's home represents an increasingly common tactic by extremist groups

item.title: ソニー・ピクチャーズ エンタテインメントが、米国とカナダにおけるディズニーのDVD、ブルーレイディスク、その他のフィジカルメディアの製造、配給、販売契約を締結（Rebecca Rubin/Variety）
item.description:
Rebecca Rubin / Variety:
Sony Pictures Entertainment strikes a deal to manufacture, distribute, and market Disney's DVD, Blu-ray discs, and other physical media in the US and Canada  —  Disney is outsourcing a big piece of its home entertainment division to Sony Pictures Entertainment, which will manufacture …

item.title: 一部の大手パブリッシャーが、製品をテストすることなく、ウェブ上でいかに粗悪な製品の推奨を氾濫させているか、そしてグーグルがいかに無策で彼らを助けているか（HouseFresh）
item.description:
HouseFresh:
How some big publishers are inundating the web with subpar product recommendations without testing the products, and how Google is helping them through inaction  —  And why you shouldn't trust product recommendations from big media publishers ranking at the top of Google

item.title: ロシア税務当局がRFE/RLの破産手続きを開始したことを受け、ロシアはRFE/RLを「望ましくない組織」と位置づける（Nate Ostiller/The Kyiv Independent）
item.description:
Nate Ostiller / The Kyiv Independent:
Russia labels RFE/RL an “undesirable organization”, following an earlier decision by Russian tax authorities to begin bankruptcy proceedings against the outlet  —  Russia labeled Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty (RFE/RL) an “undesirable organization,” the outlet reported on Feb. 20, citing Russia's Justice Ministry.

item.title: 訴訟文書：FuboTV、ディズニー、フォックス、WBDのスポーツ・ストリーミング合弁計画を提訴、「競争の極端な抑制」を理由に（CNBC）
item.description:
CNBC:
Lawsuit document: FuboTV sues Disney, Fox, and WBD over their planned joint venture in sports streaming, citing “extreme suppression of competition”  —  - FuboTV is suing Disney, Fox and Warner Bros. Discovery over their recently announced sports streaming joint venture, according to a copy of the lawsuit obtained by CNBC.

item.title: YouTubeがニールセンの米国トップストリーミングサービスになって1年、YouTubeのニッキー・レトケ副社長とタラ・レヴィ副社長にNFL、広告イノベーション、クリエイターなどについてQ&A（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
As YouTube marks one year as Nielsen's top US streaming service, a Q&A with YouTube VPs Nicky Rettke and Tara Levy on the NFL, ad innovation, creators, and more  —  EXCLUSIVE: YouTube has been racking up milestones lately.  Its pay-TV bundle, YouTube TV, just passed 8 million subscribers.

item.title: アップル、毎月のApple Music Replayを開始、総聴取時間、トップソング、アーティスト、アルバムなどのインサイトを提供、2024年のReplay Mixプレイリストを公開（Benjamin Mayo/9to5Mac）
item.description:
Benjamin Mayo / 9to5Mac:
Apple debuts a monthly Apple Music Replay, offering insights like total listening time, top songs, artists, and albums, and releases 2024's Replay Mix playlist  —  Apple today updated the Apple Music Replay experience, available at replay.music.apple.com, with visualizations of your favorite music habits …

item.title: 情報筋インドの市場規制当局がZee Entertainmentの会計に2億4100万ドルのギャップを発見（Bloomberg）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: India's market regulator has found a $241M gap in Zee Entertainment's accounting  —  - Diverted funds may be 10 times of what was estimated initially  — Zee's merger with Sony's local unit was called off last month … India's market regulator has found a hole of more than $240 million …

item.title: ニールセン：YouTubeは12ヶ月連続で米国トップのストリーミングサービス、YouTubeによると視聴者はテレビで1日1B時間以上YouTubeを見ている（Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Lauren Forristal / TechCrunch:
Nielsen: YouTube has been the top streaming service in the US for 12 consecutive months; YouTube says viewers watch 1B+ hours of YouTube per day on their TVs  —  Nielsen today released its January report on viewing usage across linear TV and streaming, which revealed that YouTube is once again …
